name: Nightmare's in the Nuthouse
description:
Controls - W,A,S,D to move

To progress simple walk over the white keycards (white rectangles). Each card collected will open the door to the next room with a white keycard. Once you have all three simply walk out the front door.

Story: Nurse Nikki has fallen asleep in the broom closet of the Asylum for the criminally insane she works at. Somehow the inmates have taken over and now she must slink through the hallways collecting keycards to make it back outside.

Notes: This is actually my least favorite thing that I have made so far so please tear it to shreds.
